args:
Although the group succeeds in persuading
Alex, Leonidas is equally successful in
unleashing a portion of Morsayati's body.
Having obtained tremendous mana, the crown
prince departs—but not before leaving behind
a fierce manticore for the party to battle.
See the miasma that swirls in this place!\nThis proves it to be the location of a lost\npiece of Morsayati.
Alex! Watch over me until I have\ncompleted the rite of unsealing.
Brother, stop this! Alex, move aside!
I don't think ya got a damn clue\nhow bad this is gonna end up!
My mind is clear—my duty is to safeguard\nHis Excellency from all harm.
Even if it means Morsayati spreading his\ntendrils across the world, so long as the\nIlian Church is protected, I am satisfied.
I do all this for the children yet to come.
Alex, you must step aside.\nThis is the last time I will ask.
If you refuse to do so, by Ilia's will\nI shall cut you down myself.
Each of us is a disciple of the goddess,\nyet it seems we cannot reconcile our\ndual ideals into a single whole.
Let us bring this to an end, Elisanne!\nLet us fight until one of us is the victor\nand the other knows oblivion!
Would you truly draw your sword\nagainst me?
Has all we have experienced been leading\nto this singular moment?
Some years ago, I took it upon myself\nto save a young girl—to save YOU.
I believe that every child is blessed by the\ngoddess; that every life ought bask in the\nwarm light of happiness.
It is because of that belief that I ushered\nyou into the Church and treated you as\nI would my own family.
I've not forgotten the many seasons\nwe spent together, Alex.
Are you sure it's okay, Elisanne?
I can really stay here forever?\nI won't be a bother?
You may stay here as long as you like.
And even though it is bitterly cold outside,\nyou'll have naught but warm thoughts here.
Did we spend all that time together\nonly to have it end like...this?
Will you truly force me to take your life\nafter I gave everything to save it?
You say you want to protect\na paradise, yet what you're\nbringing about is the opposite!
You would go through all this to resurrect\nMorsayati, and for what?
We were born in the wrong times...
The thought of taking your life haunts me.\nYet if staying my hand means I will be\nunable to return the Church to glory...
Then you plan to kill me.\nBut are you able, Alex?!
Forgive me, Elisanne! What I do,\nI do for the children who come after us!
You're not saving any children like this.
What would you know of it?!
If you assist in Morsayati's resurrection,\nyou may indeed return the Church\nto the way it once was.
But a world controlled by Morsayati will\nbe a world of conflict and pain.
No matter how many children the Church\nmay help in such a world, countless more\nwill suffer unspeakable horrors.
Is that REALLY what you want?
You've lost a place precious to you,\nand that's a pain I know well.
But if you don't move past that,\nyou'll never build something new.
The paradise you seek is false, Alex!\nTurn back while you still can!
Heh heh. Just a little more, dear Alex.\nHold them off for a moment longer.
O, Sleeper! Return now to this\nplace and let the strength of\nMorsayati flow through me!
Do you want to live in a world ruled\nby such a heartless creature?!
Or do you want a kind world where\npeople love and care for each other?
Think back to those days we spent\ntogether! Think back to the time when\nI first took your hand in mine!
If you would save children yet to come...\nthen END THIS NOW!
*pant* *pant* I think I always knew that\nmy loyalty to Leonidas was unlikely\nto be reciprocated.
Yet I was still willing to sacrifice all\nif it gained my paradise.
The Church is everything to me.\nAnd if it is gone...
But I cannot run from that pain.\nIf the Church is truly fallen,\nthen I will see it rebuilt!
It always saddens me to see a cur\nturn on its master.
But it is no matter; the rite is complete!\nMorsayati's power shall be released!
I felt a malicious energy just there!\nWhat happened to it?! Where did it go?!
It flew from the Forsaken Way\nlike a shooting star.
The portion of Morsayati's body that was\nhere has taken flight in order to join\nwith the core.
The portion I just released was but\na small piece of Morsayati's whole.
When freed, they return home.\nMorsayati reclaims his body bit by bit.
So Morsayati possessed my sister in\norder to see himself reborn...

How quick you are—and how foolish.
Regardless, without its power, such
a thing is nothing more than a husk.
I have no need for such trifles.
Rather, the true thing of value is what it\nleft behind—a vast accumulation of mana\nsealed within a Sacred Shard!
The rule of this world shall be wrested\naway from dragons and placed in the\nhands of humanity!
No ordinary person could receive this gift.\nBut my body pulses with dragonblood like\nno other!
Would somebody please tell me what\nthe hell's goin' on here?!
I shall master this otherworldly power\nand bring the entire world to heel!
I shall usher in a glorious age as a new\nemperor whose power exceeds even\nthe Dyrenell Empire!
Heh... AAAAH HA HA HA HA!
Okay, what's up with this light?!
AAAAAH HA HA HA HA HA!\nThis power is like nothing else!
And it would seem the Flow Eternal has\nbeen released as well.
We battled this fiend in the Mistholt,\nand then another in the Binding Ruins.
So it's a product of otherworldly power?\nAnd quite a big one, judging from\nthat roar.
If we choose to fight, we will likely\nnot leave this place unscathed.
And that means you too, Leonidas!\nAre you INSANE?!
This thing doesn't care what side you're\non—it'll kill you as soon as it does us!
Ah, but don't you see? I am already\ntwo steps ahead of you.
Hey, that's that same thing the Emperor\nused to teleport away!
Indeed. By warping the very fabric of\nspace-time, one with the will can move\nas freely as their heart desires.
Oh no ya don't. I ain't lettin' you run.

Fascinating. Even a slight usage of
this power renders me unstoppable...
But there's no need for me to deal
with you myself.
The manticore will prove a more than\nsufficient end for your merry band, Brother.
I shall wait at the entrance of the\nForsaken Way...for you to become\nthe manticore's next meal!
What is the plan? Should we try to\nsneak out of this place and avoid\ndetection by the manticore?
If that creature escapes out into the\nworld, it's going to hurt uncountable\nnumbers of people.
The Flow Eternal... If a wound really has\nbeen opened in the world, we have to\nfind a way to close it.
You endeavor to fight the beast?
I do. If we must run from a fiend,\nno matter how powerful, we have\nno hope of standing against my brother.
Steel yourselves, everyone, and lend me\nyour aid! We will defeat the manticore\nand then pursue Leonidas!
